attributes.action: Lets have a national event and campaign to unite the country against home grown terrorism
attributes.additional_details:
The government should set up a campaign to allow genuine peace loving muslim community of this country to rise up along side non-muslims and condemn, embarrass and shame anything of the like or in support of what we saw in Woolwich and on 7/7. Something that people can get behind.

Lets get enough signatures to start something positive. Lets make terrorism unfashionable.
